import React, {useState, Component} from "react"; import {Link, Redirect} from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; // import logoImg from "../img/logo.jpg"; import {useAuth} from "../context/auth"; import { MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBInput, MDBBtn } from 'mdbreact'; function Home() { const [isLoggedIn, setLoggedIn] = useState(false); const [isError, setIsError] = useState(false); const [userName, setUserName] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const { setAuthTokens } = useAuth(); function postLogin() { axios.post("https://www.somePlace.com/auth/login", { userName, password }).then(result => { if (result.status === 200) { setAuthTokens(result.data); setLoggedIn(true); } else { setIsError(true); } }).catch(e => { setIsError(true); }); } if (isLoggedIn) { return ; } return (
